data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 417,236 believers in the county of Xiangfan with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Xiangfan, Hubei, China
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the county of Xiangfan access to a Bible in their own language.
Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the county of Xiangfan hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Xiangfan, Hubei, China from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Miao, Enshi people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Miao, Enshi people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Miao, Enshi people is yours.
Jesus, please help the 417,236 believers in the county of Xiangfan to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Xiangfan, Hubei, China. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.section_summary:
the county of Xiangfan, Hubei, China has a population of 5,500,000.

We estimate Xiangfan has 417,236 people who might know Jesus, 88,852 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 4,993,912 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Xiangfan, Hubei, China by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
